snippet.title: Amber Heard slams ‘abuse’ claims from former assistant amid Johnny Depp legal battle  - Latest News
snippet.description:
Thanks for watching my video. 
If you like my videos, please subscribe to the channel to receive the latest videos 
Videos can use content-based copyright law contains reasonable use Fair Use (https://www.youtube.com/yt/copyright/).    Amber Heard has hit back at allegations from a former personal assistant, who claimed the actress was ‘verbally and mentally abusive’ towards her.   Kate James worked for the Aquaman actress for three years between 2012 and 2015, during which time she alleges Amber would ‘fly into blind rages’.   However, Amber has responded to deny the claims.   In a statement provided to The Blast, a rep for Amber stated: ‘This is a statement from a disgruntled former employee who was fired for poor performance and clearly has an agenda and an axe to grind.  ‘These ridiculous allegations have no basis in fact and no relevance to these proceedings.’   The publication claims to have obtained court documents featuring James’ declaration in the midst of Amber’s ongoing legal battle with ex-husband Johnny Depp.   In the papers, James reportedly states: ‘Amber relished the fame that came with dating Johnny.     ‘Amber was regularly verbally and mentally abusive and would often scream at me in that way, over the smallest things.   ‘She would fly into blind rages where no one could reason with her, and even if I was trying to offer an explanation, I didn’t think that she could hear me as she was so angry. It was like she thought regular things that can go wrong in any person’s life on any given day didn’t apply to her.   ‘Everything that went wrong was always my fault.’   James reportedly went on to make allegations of Amber’s drug use and claimed the Rum Diary actress used to ‘hate’ her ‘talking to Johnny’.   ‘She was very controlling and paranoid about anyone else being in his space and also about being observed by his security,’ James alleged.   But the assistant noted that she ‘never saw any sign of an altercation’ between Amber or Johnny.   ‘Or even the aftermath of a serious and messy fight in the way that Amber describes in her statements,’ she said.  The declaration continued: ‘I never saw any physical violence by either Amber or Johnny. I saw Amber much more frequently than Johnny, almost every day for three years apart from when she was out of town.     ‘I understand that the period of my employment overlaps with the majority of incidents in which Amber has alleged that Johnny was violent towards her.’   She added: ‘I never once saw any bruising, swelling, or any evidence of what could have resulted from violence. I would often see her naked, or semi-naked, when she was getting dressed or at fittings. I was around her a lot, often 7 days a week.’   Metro.co.uk has contacted Amber’s reps for comment.  Got a showbiz story?  If you’ve got a celebrity story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page – we’d
